title: [Large-Scale] Scientific Information Literacy Competency Strengthening Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic information retrieval skills and possession of specialized knowledge in scientific fields
context.additional_context: Corporate training course aiming to strengthen research data collection and evaluation competencies for science field leaders; emphasizes collaborative activities using personal learning devices and online platforms

learning_goals: Identify credible research materials from major scientific databases with 90% accuracy
Through student-generated question-based activities, over 80% of learners can derive relevant information sources
Within four weeks after the workshop, apply an information evaluation framework in the work environment with over 70% proficiency
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
